DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess tolerance , pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic property multiple dose adminstration SHR4640 healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Study SHR4640 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 55 , male ; 2 . Body weight≥50 , BMI:1925kg/m2 ; 3.4 mg/dL≤Screening serum urate level≤7 mg/dL ; 4.Medically stable base physical examination , laboratory result , vital sign measurement , 12lead electrocardiogram , abdomen Bultrasound Chest Xray examination screen . 1 . Serum creatinine＞upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; 2 . Alanine aminotransferase and/or Aspartate aminotransferase＞2×ULN , total bilirubin＞1.5×ULN , glutamyltransferase＞3×ULN ; 3 . History hyperuricemia gout ; 4 . History suspicion kidney stone ; 5 . Positive result hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C antibody , HIV antibody , syphilis antibody test .
